citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
Housekeeping around the kennel needs to be addressed. There is an accumulation of dust on the ceiling fans and heater
in the building. There is spilled liquid on the bottom of the fridge that needs to be cleaned. There are two empty outdoor
runs that have old feces that needs to be removed. Lastly, the wheel barrow used to clean is left outside the kennel
adjacent to an outdoor run filled with recently removed shavings, feces and debris. These areas need to be addressed to
keep the building clean and in good repair for the overall health of the dogs.
Correct by: Feb 8, 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.11(c)
